thread.title: GameDay Live: Patriots remain unbeaten after beating Colts, 34-27
thread.title_full: GameDay Live: Patriots remain unbeaten after beating Colts, 34-27 | Boston Herald

author: Herald Staff
title: GameDay Live: Patriots remain unbeaten after beating Colts, 34-27
text: After an off-season marred by accusations of equipment tampering in the AFC title game, the Super Bowl champion Patriots finally get their chance to take on the team that dragged their name through the mud as Tom Brady and company ride into Indianapolis to take on Andrew Luck's Colts in primetime. Join the Boston Herald sports staff to talk Deflategate revenge during the Pats-Colts Sunday Night Football game.
